smile.netlib

Class NLMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.math.matrix.Matrix
      • smile.math.matrix.DenseMatrix
        • smile.math.matrix.JMatrix
          • smile.netlib.NLMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, MatrixMultiplication<DenseMatrix,DenseMatrix>

    public class NLMatrix
extends JMatrix
    Column-major matrix that employs netlib for matrix-vector and matrix-matrix computation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NLMatrix(double[] A)
      Constructor of a column vector/matrix with given array as the internal storage.

      Constructor.

      Constructor of all-zero matrix.
      NLMatrix(int rows, int cols, double value)
      Constructor.
      NLMatrix(int rows, int cols, double[] value)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NLMatrix aat()
      Returns A * A'
      NLMatrix abmm(DenseMatrix B)
      Returns the result of matrix multiplication A * B.
      NLMatrix abtmm(DenseMatrix B)
      Returns the result of matrix multiplication A * B'.
      NLMatrix ata()
      Returns A' * A
      NLMatrix atbmm(DenseMatrix B)
      Returns the result of matrix multiplication A' * B.
      double[] atx(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A' * x
      double[] atxpy(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A' * x + y
      double[] atxpy(double[] x, double[] y, double b)
      y = A' * x + b * y
      double[] ax(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A * x
      double[] axpy(double[] x, double[] y)
      y = A * x + y
      double[] axpy(double[] x, double[] y, double b)
      y = A * x + b * y
      Cholesky cholesky()
      Cholesky decomposition for symmetric and positive definite matrix.
      NLMatrix copy()
      Returns a copy of this matrix.
      double[] eig()
      Returns the eigen values in an array of size 2N.
      EVD eigen()
      Returns the eigen value decomposition.
      LU lu()
      LU decomposition is computed by a "left-looking", dot-product, Crout/Doolittle algorithm.
      QR qr()
      QR Decomposition is computed by Householder reflections.
      SVD svd()
      Returns the singular value decomposition.
      NLMatrix transpose()
      Returns the matrix transpose.

      • cholesky

        public Cholesky cholesky()
        Description copied from class: JMatrix
        Cholesky decomposition for symmetric and positive definite matrix. Only the lower triangular part will be used in the decomposition.
        Overrides:
        cholesky in class JMatrix

      • svd

        public SVD svd()
        Description copied from class: DenseMatrix
        Returns the singular value decomposition. Note that the input matrix will hold U on output.
        Overrides:
        svd in class JMatrix

      • eig

        public double[] eig()
        Description copied from class: DenseMatrix
        Returns the eigen values in an array of size 2N. The first half and second half of returned array contain the real and imaginary parts, respectively, of the computed eigenvalues.
        Overrides:
        eig in class JMatrix

      • eigen

        public EVD eigen()
        Description copied from class: DenseMatrix
        Returns the eigen value decomposition. Note that the input matrix will be overwritten on output.
        Overrides:
        eigen in class JMatrix
